DataSourceDefinition.Name: REP-106
DataSourceDefinition.Expression: SELECT GEN_PAIS.VAL_I18N PAIS, SOCIEDAD.VAL_DENO SOCIEDAD, FAC.VAL_NOMB_PERI, FAC.OID_REGI, FAC.DES_REGI, REC.COD_OPER, REC.DES_OPERA OPERACION, FAC.COD_ZONA, FAC.GERENTE, FAC.FACTURADO, REC.OPERACION CANT_OPERACION, DECODE(FAC.FACTURADO,0,0,(REC.OPERACION/FAC.FACTURADO)*100) POR_OPER_FACT, DECODE(FAC.UNID_ATEN,0,0,(REC.OPERACION/FAC.UNID_ATEN)*100) PORC_PARTICIPACION, FAC.TOTAL, FAC.UNID_ATEN NUM_UNID_ATEN FROM ( SELECT PER.VAL_NOMB_PERI, REG.DES_REGI, ZON.COD_ZONA, PER.OID_PERI, REG.OID_REGI, ZON.OID_ZONA, CLI.VAL_APE1||' '||CLI.VAL_APE2||' '||CLI.VAL_NOM1||' '||CLI.VAL_NOM2 GERENTE, SUM(FAC_LIN.NUM_UNID_ATEN) UNID_ATEN, SUM(FAC.VAL_TOTA_PAGA_LOCA) TOTAL, COUNT(DISTINCT FAC.OID_CABE) FACTURADO FROM FAC_DOCUM_CONTA_CABEC FAC, FAC_DOCUM_CONTA_LINEA FAC_LIN, ZON_REGIO REG, ZON_ZONA ZON, CRA_PERIO PER, MAE_CLIEN CLI, PED_SOLIC_CABEC PSC, ( SELECT FEC_INIC FROM CRA_PERIO WHERE OID_PERI = %value_PERIODOINICIALVALUE% )PER_INI, ( SELECT FEC_FINA FROM CRA_PERIO WHERE OID_PERI = DECODE(%value_PERIODOFINALVALUE%,-1, %value_PERIODOINICIALVALUE%,%value_PERIODOFINALVALUE%) )PER_FIN WHERE FAC.OID_CABE = FAC_LIN.DCCA_OID_CABE AND FAC.ZORG_OID_REGI = REG.OID_REGI AND FAC.ZZON_OID_ZONA = ZON.OID_ZONA AND FAC.PERD_OID_PERI = PER.OID_PERI AND FAC.SOCA_OID_SOLI_CABE = PSC.OID_SOLI_CABE AND PSC.IND_OC = 1 AND REG.OID_REGI = ZON.ZORG_OID_REGI AND ZON.CLIE_OID_CLIE = CLI.OID_CLIE(+) AND PER_INI.FEC_INIC <= PER.FEC_INIC AND PER.FEC_FINA <= PER_FIN.FEC_FINA AND PER.PAIS_OID_PAIS = %value_PAISVALUE% %start_REGIONVALUES% AND REG.OID_REGI IN (%value_REGIONVALUES%) %end_REGIONVALUES% %start_ZONAVALUES% AND ZON.OID_ZONA IN (%value_ZONAVALUES%) %end_ZONAVALUES% AND PER.MARC_OID_MARC IN (%value_MARCAVALUE%) AND PER.CANA_OID_CANA IN (%value_CANALVALUE%) GROUP BY PER.VAL_NOMB_PERI, REG.DES_REGI, ZON.COD_ZONA, PER.OID_PERI, REG.OID_REGI, ZON.OID_ZONA, CLI.VAL_APE1||' '||CLI.VAL_APE2||' '||CLI.VAL_NOM1||' '||CLI.VAL_NOM2 ) FAC, ( SELECT PER.VAL_NOMB_PERI, REG.DES_REGI, ZON.COD_ZONA, OP.COD_OPER, GEN_OP.OPERACION DES_OPERA, PER.OID_PERI, REG.OID_REGI, ZON.OID_ZONA, SUM(LIN_REC.NUM_UNID_RECL) OPERACION FROM REC_CABEC_RECLA CAB_REC, REC_OPERA_RECLA OP_REC, REC_LINEA_OPERA_RECLA LIN_REC, REC_TIPOS_OPERA T_OP, REC_OPERA OP, ZON_REGIO REG, ZON_ZONA ZON, MAE_CLIEN CLI, CRA_PERIO PER, ( SELECT FEC_INIC FROM CRA_PERIO WHERE OID_PERI = %value_PERIODOINICIALVALUE% )PER_INI, ( SELECT FEC_FINA FROM CRA_PERIO WHERE OID_PERI = DECODE( %value_PERIODOFINALVALUE%,-1, %value_PERIODOINICIALVALUE%,%value_PERIODOFINALVALUE%) )PER_FIN, ( SELECT VAL_OID, VAL_I18N OPERACION FROM V_GEN_I18N_SICC WHERE ATTR_ENTI = 'REC_OPERA' AND IDIO_OID_IDIO = %value_IDIOMAVALUE% )GEN_OP, ZON_SECCI SEC, ZON_TERRI_ADMIN TER WHERE CASE WHEN (-1 IN (%value_OPERACIONVALUES%)) THEN OP.IND_ANUL ELSE 0 END <> 1 AND CAB_REC.PERD_OID_PERI_DOCU_REFE = PER.OID_PERI AND PER_INI.FEC_INIC <= PER.FEC_INIC AND PER.FEC_FINA <= PER_FIN.FEC_FINA AND PER.PAIS_OID_PAIS = %value_PAISVALUE% AND PER.MARC_OID_MARC IN (%value_MARCAVALUE%) AND PER.CANA_OID_CANA IN (%value_CANALVALUE%) AND REG.OID_REGI = ZON.ZORG_OID_REGI AND ZON.OID_ZONA = SEC.ZZON_OID_ZONA AND SEC.OID_SECC = TER.ZSCC_OID_SECC AND CAB_REC.ZTAD_OID_TERR_ADMI = TER.OID_TERR_ADMI AND CAB_REC.CLIE_OID_CLIE = CLI.OID_CLIE AND CAB_REC.OID_CABE_RECL = OP_REC.CARE_OID_CABE_RECL AND OP.OID_OPER = T_OP.ROPE_OID_OPER AND T_OP.OID_TIPO_OPER = OP_REC.TIOP_OID_TIPO_OPER AND LIN_REC.OPRE_OID_OPER_RECL = OP_REC.OID_OPER_RECL AND OP.OID_OPER = GEN_OP.VAL_OID(+) AND CASE WHEN (-1 IN (%value_OPERACIONVALUES%)) THEN -1 ELSE OP.OID_OPER END IN (%value_OPERACIONVALUES%) %start_REGIONVALUES% AND REG.OID_REGI IN (%value_REGIONVALUES%) %end_REGIONVALUES% %start_ZONAVALUES% AND ZON.OID_ZONA IN (%value_ZONAVALUES%) %end_ZONAVALUES% GROUP BY PER.VAL_NOMB_PERI, REG.DES_REGI, ZON.COD_ZONA, GEN_OP.OPERACION, PER.OID_PERI, OP.COD_OPER, REG.OID_REGI, ZON.OID_ZONA ) REC, ( SELECT SOC.VAL_DENO FROM PRINCIPALS PRI, PROPERTYVALUES PRO, SEG_SOCIE SOC WHERE PRI.NAME = %VALUE_ZONEUSERVALUE% AND PRO.IDPROPERTY = 48 AND PRO.IDPRINCIPAL = PRI.IDPRINCIPAL AND SOC.OID_SOCI = PRO.STRINGVALUE ) SOCIEDAD, ( SELECT VAL_OID, VAL_I18N FROM V_GEN_I18N_SICC WHERE ATTR_ENTI = 'SEG_PAIS' AND IDIO_OID_IDIO = %value_IDIOMAVALUE% AND VAL_OID = %value_PAISVALUE% ) GEN_PAIS WHERE FAC.OID_PERI = REC.OID_PERI(+) AND FAC.OID_REGI = REC.OID_REGI(+) AND FAC.OID_ZONA = REC.OID_ZONA(+)
